task.title: Managing Privacy Restrictions
task.shortdesc: Restrict or release parts of your directory information under FERPA guidelines through MyPack Portal.

step.cmd: Log into MyPack Portal using your NC State Unity account.
From the left-hand navigation menu, select "Privacy Restrictions."
Choose to "Restrict" or "Clear" access under the directory fields you want to manage.
If applying a Full Privacy Block, click the relevant field, check "Restricted," and select any exceptions.
Click the green "Save" button to apply your changes.

taskbody.result: After completing these steps, your directory information settings will be updated according to your preferences.
